ygData.subject: RE: Mana song in battle
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, when I hit 50, I will be dictating tactics again.  No one listens to you unless you are level 50 anymore.  For now, I really need experience, and if
ygData.messageBody:
> My, my, how the tunes we sing change! (hehe - referring to your posts back
> when you were level 35 and ready to dictate tactics, lead the party and
> control the fight, etc. etc.)

Well, when I hit 50, I will be dictating tactics again. No one
listens to you unless you are level 50 anymore. For now, I really
need experience, and if Mr. Big Wizard says dont fight and play
manasong, I will happily consent as long as my bar moves =)

> Cus real soon having good teams is gonna be real important.

Whatta mean really soon? I got em now =P hehe. Mr. Guano
Harvester decided to drop me a cloak of shadows last night.
We kicked his butt good too, darn turd collector.

Harmonic.
